'''Shriveled Seed''' is a Quest Item obtained from a chest in [[The Chasm: Underground Mines]] during the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] "[[Seed from the Valley of Life]]" and gives the ''[[Wonders of the World]]'' [[Achievement]] "[[People of the Valley of Life]]".
